data.title: Sharon Ponds Brown
meta_keywords: Trinity Retirement Solutions of Raymond James
data.meta_description: She also greatly assists our financial advisors and plays a key role in preparing reports, processing documents and handling administrative duties.
data.text:
Throughout her 20-year career in financial services, Sharon has used her compassion, attention to detail and dependable nature to ensure clients are provided the high level of dedicated service they deserve. She approaches each client request or question with a positive attitude and conscientious manner.

She also greatly assists our financial advisors and plays a key role in preparing reports, processing documents and handling administrative duties.

Before joining our team in July 2022, Sharon was an office and service manager at NFP. Sharon earned a bachelor’s degree in business administration and a minor in accounting from Athens State University.

Originally from Hamilton, Alabama, Sharon now lives in Dothan, Alabama, with her pet Yorkie, Eme. She has one son, Jesse, who lives in Huntsville, Alabama. In her free time, Sharon enjoys gardening, interior design, reading, working out and spending time with friends.

Sharon gives back to her community by serving as president for her neighborhood’s homeowner association, something she has done for the past 12 years.
